Tokenizers¶

py_stringmatching.tokenizers.delimiter(*args, **kwargs)¶

Delimiter based tokenizer

Args:
input_string (str): A string to extract tokens from. delim_str (str): Delimiter string
Returns:
If the input string is not None and delim_str is not None, then a list of tokens are returned.
py_stringmatching.tokenizers.qgram(*args, **kwargs)¶

QGram tokenizer. A q-gram is defined as all sequences of q characters. Q-grams are also known as n-grams and k-grams.

Args:
input_string (str): A string to extract q-grams from qval (int): The q-gram length (defaults to 2)
Returns:
If the input string is not None and qval is less than length of the input then, a list of qgrams is returned.
py_stringmatching.tokenizers.whitespace(*args, **kwargs)¶

White space based tokenizer

Args:
input_string (str): A string to extract tokens from.
Returns:
If the input string is not None, then a list of tokens are returned.
